description.displayText: Sarah has been an incredible caretaker, companion, and dear friend of our daughter for the past year. Our daughter adores her, and really thrives thanks to Sarah's attentive, loving, and thoughtful interactive plays and communication through sign language and verbal communication. Sarah is knowledgeable in sign language and taught our daughter several helpful words that helped so much in our daily lives. She truly cares for our child. They have built an amazing relationship. Sarah balances freedom and structure extremely well, and we think it contributed greatly to our daughter's development. Sarah is probably the most trust-worthy caretaker in our family. She is also collaborative, and work with us as a team. The love and trust our daughter has for her really is the only testimony needed to demonstrate Sarah's capability as a successful and trust-worthy caretaker.
description.originalText: Sarah has been an incredible caretaker, companion, and dear friend of our daughter for the past year. Our daughter adores her, and really thrives thanks to Sarah's attentive, loving, and thoughtful interactive plays and communication through sign language and verbal communication. Sarah is knowledgeable in sign language and taught our daughter several helpful words that helped so much in our daily lives. She truly cares for our child. They have built an amazing relationship. Sarah balances freedom and structure extremely well, and we think it contributed greatly to our daughter's development. Sarah is probably the most trust-worthy caretaker in our family. She is also collaborative, and work with us as a team. The love and trust our daughter has for her really is the only testimony needed to demonstrate Sarah's capability as a successful and trust-worthy caretaker.

description.displayText:
Sarah is a very professional, dependable individual who is wonderful with people of all ages. She's creative,  fun, smart and has a good head on her shoulders.

She's great in an emergency situation--and can handle whatever comes her way. When our children were younger, they loved to spend time with Sarah--and my husband and I were always secure that the kids were in good hands when Sarah was around.

She does a great job at balancing "having fun" with "getting things done." 

Both my husband and I highly recommend Sarah in all her endeavors. She is a delight!
